name: TerrainRegion
type: class
memorycategory: Instances
summary: ''
description: |
  A TerrainRegion is a snapshot of Class.Terrain retrieved from the
  Class.Terrain:CopyRegion() method. Can be later pasted into the Terrain
  using Class.Terrain:PasteRegion().

    summary: |
      The state of this property shows whether or not this Class.TerrainRegion
      contains smooth terrain.

methods:
  - name: TerrainRegion:ConvertToSmooth
    summary: |
      Transforms the TerrainRegion so it can be used with smooth terrain.
    description: |
      Calling this method transforms the TerrainRegion into a
      Class.TerrainRegion usable for Class.Terrain. This can only be done
      from a plugin, when in edit mode.

      The game can't be running, nor can it have a Class.NetworkServer.
    codesamples: []
